title: New: Warm Speakers – Youth
content:
This new track from NY’s Warm Speakers is rather fitting for current weather conditions, with the summer well and truly behind us, and shorter days and colder mornings beginning to kick in, Youth acts as a sort of Autumn-comedown.

If you had to stereotype, it’d probably fall under the glo-fi genre, yet the last minute in particular are far too beautiful to be hurriedly categorized. There’s touches of Washed Out and Blackbird Blackbird in the instrumental sections, whilst the vocals add a much needed extra layer, preventing it from becoming ‘just another chillwave song’. Check out Youth below, the first track from Warm Speaker’s upcoming full length, expected 2012.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
